description: This file appears to be a Python source code file that defines functions for generating code related to JSON-RPC emitting. It includes functions to emit event handlers, RPC prologues/epilogues, and complete RPC code for a specified root schema, indicating its role in code generation.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates code for emitting a JSON-RPC event handler function based on event schema and parameters.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the initial code setup including includes, namespace declarations, and versioning for RPC source files.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Closes namespace blocks and finalizes the code structure for RPC source files.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits versioning namespace code with major, minor, and patch version constants.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates complete RPC registration and unregistration code blocks along with event code emission.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function that coordinates emission of the full RPC code, including prologue, main body, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Function that emits versioning code along with prologue and epilogue for a specific RPC source file.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
